image_1.description: Former President Donald J. Trump, described as a man with light-colored hair, wearing a dark suit and a red tie, is central to the ballot case being ruled on by the Supreme Court, concerning his eligibility for the Colorado Republican primary ballot. The state's top court declared that he had engaged in insurrection in his efforts to subvert the 2020 election.

image_2.description: A submerged playground in Buckhurst Hill, northeast of London, as a result of heavy rains and flooding in Europe.

image_5.description: Joseph Lelyveld was a Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist and former executive editor for The New York Times, leading the organization to record levels of revenue and profits, and introducing digital operations.

image_6.description: Glynis Johns was an actress known for her role in 'Mary Poppins.

image_7.description: Steve Martin's role in 'Roxanne' is mentioned in the context of cinema's fake noses.
